abstract: NASA reports July 2016 was hottest month ever recorded since adequate record-keeping began in 1880; agency attributes overall global warming linked to greenhouse gas emissions as factor in record.

headline.print_headline: Climate Change: Another Hottest Month Ever, NASA Says
headline.main: How Hot Was It in July? Hotter Than Ever.

snippet: A string of global heat records continued last month. El Niño contributed to it, as did overall warming linked to greenhouse gas emissions....
lead_paragraph: A string of global heat records continued last month. El Niño contributed to it, as did overall warming linked to greenhouse gas emissions.
